revised_title: Trypanosome uniforme: A New Species of Trypanosome Disease in Domestic Animals in Uganda
tldr: The authors discover a new species of trypanosome disease, Trypanosoma uniforme, affecting domestic animals in Uganda. They describe its morphology, size, and susceptibility in various animals, and compare it to the closely related species Trypanosoma vivax. However, they are unable to determine the carrier of the disease or successfully cultivate it in the lab.
